name: Litterland
description:
We finally didn't make it to the PlayStation Talents 2019 semifinalists. We don't want you to be eager to try the demo, so here you can download it and play! we hope you like it!

You need to connect the PlayStation controller to your PC in order to play.

CREDITS
David Arnau Hernández - 3D Modeling, Stage Assembly, UI, HUD
Cristina Esteban González - 3D Modeling, Animation, Texturing, 2D Art
Adrián González Hornillos - Programming
Luna Sampedro Jiménez - 3D Modeling, Sound FX, Sound and Music Integration, Particles

ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
